attributes.review: As an avid trump supporter, I was very excited to download this app. However, when it finally finished downloading I saw that the app was very poorly designed. NOT user friendly AT ALL, which is a shame since most trump supporters are older people. The aesthetic of the app was also hideously garish. It hurt my eyes and caused me a trip to the doctors office. Hated this app and everything about it. Do not get it unless you want traumatic eye injuries.
attributes.title: Do not get the app
